column1: S047.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S047.DECK.  047. SURVEY NUMBER
S047.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S047.Q1. WHEN DID YOU COME INTO THE ARM?  1. 1943 2. DECEMBER 1942 3. NOVEMBER 1942 4. OCTOBER 1942 5. SEPTEMBER 1942 6. PRIOR TO SEPTEMBER 1942 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q2. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARM?  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED 3. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q3. AT THE TIME YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY DID YOU THINK YOU SHOULD HAVE BEEN DEFERRE?  1. NO 2. YES (DEPENDENTS WHO NEEDED MY SUPPORT, THE IMPORTANCE OF MY JOB, MY PHYSICAL CONDITION WAS NOT GOOD, OTHER REASONS) 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S047.Q4. ARE YO?  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. DIVORCED 4. SEPARATED 5. WIDOWED 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q5A. WITH GERMAN?  01. LESS THAN A YEAR OR JUST "1943" - NOT OVER A YEAR 02. ONE YEAR - ABOUT A YEAR 03. OVER ONE YEAR BUT LESS THAN TWO, OR JUST "1944" - AT LEAST A YEAR 04. TWO YEARS 05. OVER TWO YEARS BUT LESS THAN THREE, OR JUST "1945" - AT LEAST TWO YEARS 06. THREE YEARS 07. OVER THREE YEARS 08. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A SHORT TIME - E.G. "NOT LONG" 09. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A LONG TIME - E.G. "SEVERAL YEARS YET" 10. INDEFINITE ANSWER WITH NO INDICATION OF TIME - E.G. "WILL LAST UNTIL WE STOP IT" 11. DON'T KNOW, UNDECIDED 00. NO ANSWER

S047.Q5B. WITH JAPA?  01. LESS THAN A YEAR OR JUST "1943" - NOT OVER A YEAR 02. ONE YEAR - ABOUT A YEAR 03. OVER ONE YEAR BUT LESS THAN TWO, OR JUST "1944" - AT LEAST A YEAR 04. TWO YEARS 05. OVER TWO YEARS BUT LESS THAN THREE, OR JUST "1945" - AT LEAST TWO YEARS 06. THREE YEARS 07. OVER THREE YEARS 08. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A SHORT TIME - E.G. "NOT LONG" 09. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A LONG TIME - E.G. "SEVERAL YEARS YET" 10. INDEFINITE ANSWER WITH NO INDICATION OF TIME - E.G. "WILL LAST UNTIL WE STOP IT" 11. DON'T KNOW, UNDECIDED 00. NO ANSWER
S047.Q6. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THIS CAM?  1. 0-4 DAYS 2. 5-7 DAYS 3. 8-9 DAYS 4. 10-14 DAYS 5. 15-21 DAYS 6. 22-30 DAYS 7. OVER 30 DAYS 8. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S047.Q7. ARE THE SPORTS AND ATHLETIC PROGRAMS IN YOUR CAMP WELL ARRANGE?  1. YES, VERY WELL 2. YES, FAIRLY WELL 3. NO, POORLY 4. NO, VERY POORLY 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q8. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT ARMY FOO?  1. IT IS GOOD QUALITY, AND WELL PREPARED 2. IT IS GOOD QUALITY, BUT POORLY PREPARED 3. IT IS POOR QUALITY, BUT WELL PREPARED 4. IT IS POOR QUALITY, AND POORLY PREPARED 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q9. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT MEDICAL ATTENTION IN THE ARM?  1. IT IS VERY GOOD 2. IT IS FAIRLY GOOD 3. IT IS RATHER POOR 4. IT IS VERY POOR 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q10. DO YOU GET A KICK OUT OF GIVING A SNAPPY SALUT?  1. YES, VERY MUCH 2. YES, A LITTLE 3. NO, NOT PARTICULARLY 4. NO, NONE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q11. HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, SATISFIED AND IN GOOD SPIRITS OR DISSATISFIED AND IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. SATISFIED AND IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM UP HALF THE TIME AND DOWN HALF THE TIME 3. DISSATISFIED AND IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q12. WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE STATEMENT THAT "THE ARMY MAKES A MAN OUT OF YOU"*  1. THERE IS NOT MUCH TO IT 2. THERE MAY BE SOMETHING TO IT, BUT I'M STILL DOUBTFUL 3. THERE'S A LOT TO IT 4. NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q13. DO TOO MANY OF THE ARMY RULES AND REGULATIONS SEEM USELESS TO YO?  1. YES, TOO MANY SEEM USELESS 2. NO, I USED TO THINK SO, BUT DON'T NOW 3. NO, I NEVER THOUGHT SO 4. NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q14. DO YOU THINK A SOLDIER WITH ABILITY HAS A GOOD CHANCE FOR PROMOTION IN THE ARM?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S047.Q15. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO? (PUT A CHECK ONLY BEFORE THE HIGHEST GRADE YOU COMPLETED.)  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q16. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARM?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT IS ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q17. DO YOU THINK YOU CAN MAKE GOOD IN THE ARM?  1. I FEEL PRETTY SURE I CAN MAKE GOOD 2. I AM NOT SO SURE I CAN MAKE GOOD 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q18. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSE?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q19. DID YOU EVER HAVE A JOB IN CIVILIAN LIFE THAT YOU REALLY LIKE?  1. NO, I NEVER HAD A JOB THAT REALLY SUITED ME 2. YES, I HAVE HAD A JOB I REALLY LIKED 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S047.Q20. AFTER THE WAR DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD LIKE TO COME BACK TO THE ARMY FOR TWO WEEKS OF TRAINING EVERY YEA?  1. YES, I WOULD LIKE IT VERY MUCH 2. YES, I MIGHT LIKE IT, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I WOULD LIKE IT 4. NO, I WOULD NOT LIKE IT AT ALL 5. NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q21. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JO?  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q22. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF OUTFIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE I?  1. IN A COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 2. IN A NON-COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 3. IN AN OUTFIT THAT WILL STAY IN THE UNITED STATES 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q23. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS BEST TELLS THE WAY YOU FEEL ABOUT GETTING INTO THE FIGHTIN?  01. I'M READY TO GO AND I WANT TO GET INTO THE REAL FIGHTING SOON 02. I'D LIKE TO GET IN ON THE FIGHTING BEFORE IT'S OVER BUT I DON'T THINK I'M READY YET 03. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO, BUT IF I DO, I THINK I'LL DO ALL RIGHT 04. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO, BECAUSE I DON'T THINK I'LL EVER BE GOOD AS A FIGHTER 05. NONE OF THE ABOVE FITS ME, TOO OLD FOR COMBAT DUTY 06. NONE OF THE ABOVE FITS ME, NOT PHYSICALLY FIT FOR COMBAT DUTY 07. NONE OF THE ABOVE FITS ME. SHOULD BE IN WAR INDUSTRY 08. CHECK "1", BUT QUALIFIES BY ASKING FOR FURLOUGH, WIFE'S PERMISSION, ETC. 09. WOULD PREFER TO BE INSTRUCTOR 10. OTHER COMMENTS INDICATING THAT MAN DOES NOT WISH COMBAT 11. ALL OTHER 00. NO ANSWER
S047.Q24. ARE YOU LIMITED SERVIC?  1. YES, I AM LIMITED SERVICE 2. NO, I AM NOT LIMITED SERVICE 3. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q25. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  1. 19 YEARS OR YOUNGER 2. 20 YEARS 3. 21 TO 24 4. 25 TO 27 5. 28 TO 29 6. 30 TO 34 7. 35 TO 37 8. 38 YEARS OR OLDER 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q26. WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR IDEA OF HOW HARD IT IS GOING TO BE TO BEAT THE GERMAN?  1. IT WILL NOT BE VERY HARD 2. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB BUT OUR LOSSES SHOULDN'T BE TOO HEAVY 3. IT WILL BE A VERY TOUGH JOB, WITH HEAVY LOSSES OF MEN AND MATERIALS 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S047.Q27. WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR IDEA OF HOW HARD IT IS GOING TO BE TO BEAT THE JAPANES?  1. IT WILL NOT BE VERY HARD 2. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB BUT OUR LOSSES SHOULDN'T BE TOO HEAVY 3. IT WILL BE A VERY TOUGH JOB, WITH HEAVY LOSSES OF MEN AND MATERIALS 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S047.Q28. "WHAT KIND OF A COUNTRY WILL THIS BE AFTER THE WAR*" HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU WONDERED ABOUT THE QUESTION ABOV?  1. I HAVE WONDERED A GREAT DEAL ABOUT IT 2. I HAVE WONDERED FAIRLY OFTEN ABOUT IT 3. I HAVE HARDLY EVER WONDERED ABOUT IT 4. I HAVE NEVER WONDERED ABOUT IT 0. NO ANSWER P. A SOLDIER MAY HAVE WONDERED ABOUT MANY OTHER QUESTIONS CONCERNING HIS PERSONAL FUTURE. LOOK OVER EACH OF THE FOLLOWING 5 QUESTIONS AND CHECK THE ANSWER WHICH SHOWS HOW MUCH, IF ANY, YOU HAVE BEEN WONDERING ABOUT IT.

S047.Q29. WILL I COME OUT OF THE WAR BADLY CRIPPLED OR DISFIGURE?  1. I HAVE WONDERED A GREAT DEAL ABOUT IT 2. I HAVE WONDERED FAIRLY OFTEN ABOUT IT 3. I HAVE HARDLY EVER WONDERED ABOUT IT 4. I HAVE NEVER WONDERED ABOUT IT 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q30. HOW LONG WILL I HAVE TO STAY IN THE ARMY AFTER THE WAR IS OVE?  1. I HAVE WONDERED A GREAT DEAL ABOUT IT 2. I HAVE WONDERED FAIRLY OFTEN ABOUT IT 3. I HAVE HARDLY EVER WONDERED ABOUT IT 4. I HAVE NEVER WONDERED ABOUT IT 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S047.Q31. WILL I BE ABLE TO CARRY OUT THE PLANS I HAD FOR MY LIFE BEFORE THE WA?  1. I HAVE WONDERED A GREAT DEAL ABOUT IT 2. I HAVE WONDERED FAIRLY OFTEN ABOUT IT 3. I HAVE HARDLY EVER WONDERED ABOUT IT 4. I HAVE NEVER WONDERED ABOUT IT 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q32. WILL THERE BE A REAL DEPRESSION AFTER THE WA?  1. I HAVE WONDERED A GREAT DEAL ABOUT IT 2. I HAVE WONDERED FAIRLY OFTEN ABOUT IT 3. I HAVE HARDLY EVER WONDERED ABOUT IT 4. I HAVE NEVER WONDERED ABOUT IT 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q33. WILL I BE OUT OF A JOB FOR A LONG TIME AFTER THE WA?  1. I HAVE WONDERED A GREAT DEAL ABOUT IT 2. I HAVE WONDERED FAIRLY OFTEN ABOUT IT 3. I HAVE HARDLY EVER WONDERED ABOUT IT 4. I HAVE NEVER WONDERED ABOUT IT 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q34. IN GENERAL, DO YOU THINK THAT CIVILIANS (MEN AND WOMEN NOT IN UNIFORM) IN THIS COUNTRY ARE TAKING THE WAR SERIOUSLY ENOUG?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM ARE 2. A GOOD MANY ARE 3. SOME, BUT NOT MANY ARE 4. HARDLY ANY ARE 5. NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q35. IN GENERAL, DO YOU THINK CIVILIANS (MEN AND WOMEN NOT IN UNIFORM) ARE TRYING TO DO EVERYTHING THEY POSSIBLY CAN TO BACK UP THE ARMED FORCE?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM ARE 2. A GOOD MANY ARE 3. SOME, BUT NOT MANY ARE 4. HARDLY ANY ARE 5. NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q36. IN GENERAL, DO YOU THINK CIVILIANS ARE BUYING AS MANY WAR BONDS AS THEY SHOUL?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM ARE 2. A GOOD MANY ARE 3. SOME, BUT NOT MANY ARE 4. HARDLY ANY ARE 5. NO OPINION 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S047.Q37. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIF? X. CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION. DATA TRANSFERRED AS IS.

S047.Q38. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING BEFORE YOU ENTERED THE ARM?  1. ON A FARM OR IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE) 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q39J. "THE ENGLISH ARE DOING AS GOOD A JOB AS POSSIBLE OF FIGHTING THE WAR CONSIDERING EVERYTHING." X. DOCUMENTATION FOR COL. 52 (Q.39) NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION. SEE ALSO V.51.  1. AGREE 2. IN DOUBT 3. DISAGREE 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S047.Q40. CONSIDERING WHAT EACH OF THESE COUNTRIES COULD DO, WHICH ONE DO YOU THINK IS TRYING HARDEST TO WIN THE WA?  1. ENGLAND 2. RUSSIA 3. CHINA 4. UNITED STATES 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q40A. NOW, WHICH ONE DO YOU THINK IS TRYING NEXT HARDEST TO WI?  1. ENGLAND 2. RUSSIA 3. CHINA 4. UNITED STATES 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q41. HOW GOOD DO YOU THINK THE ENGLISH ARE AS FIGHTER?  1. VERY GOOD FIGHTERS 2. GOOD FIGHTERS 3. FAIR FIGHTERS 4. POOR FIGHTERS 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q42. HOW ABOUT THE RUSSIANS AS FIGHTER?  1. VERY GOOD FIGHTERS 2. GOOD FIGHTERS 3. FAIR FIGHTERS 4. POOR FIGHTERS 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q43A. THE GERMAN?  1. VERY GOOD 2. GOOD 3. FAIR 4. POOR 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q43B. THE JAPANES?  1. VERY GOOD 2. GOOD 3. FAIR 4. POOR 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q43C. THE AMERICAN?  1. VERY GOOD 2. GOOD 3. FAIR 4. POOR 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q44. DO YOU THINK ENGLAND CAN BE DEPENDED UPON TO COOPERATE WITH US AFTER THE WA?  1. WILL COOPERATE 2. WILL NOT 3. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q45. WHAT ABOUT RUSSIA, CAN WE DEPEND UPON HER TO COOPERATE AFTER THE WA?  1. WILL COOPERATE 2. WILL NOT 3. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q46. WHAT ABOUT BRAZI?  1. WILL COOPERATE 2. WILL NOT 3. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q46A. HAVE YOU EVER HAD A 3-DAY PASS OR FURLOUG?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S047.Q46B. NUMBER OF DAYS ON PASS OR FURLOUG?  01. ONE DAY - 36 HOURS 02. TWO DAYS 03. THREE DAYS 04. FOUR DAYS 05. FIVE DAYS 06. SIX DAYS 07. SEVEN DAYS 08. EIGHT DAYS 09. NINE DAYS 10. TEN DAYS OR MORE 98. NO PASS OR NO ANSWER 99. INAPPLICABLE 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S047.Q46C. DATE OF PASS OR FURLOUG?  01. APRIL 1943 02. MARCH 1943 03. FEBRUARY 1943 04. JANUARY 1943 05. DECEMBER 1942 06. NOVEMBER 1942 07. OCTOBER 1942 08. SEPTEMBER 1942 09. PRIOR TO SEPTEMBER 1942 98. NO PASS OR NO ANSWER 99. INAPPLICABLE 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S047.Q46D. DATE OF LAST PA?  01. APRIL 1943 OR JUST "APRIL" 02. MARCH 1943 OR JUST "MARCH" 03. FEBRUARY 1943 04. JANUARY 1943 05. DECEMBER 1942 06. NOVEMBER 1942 07. OCTOBER 1942 08. SEPTEMBER 1942 09. PRIOR TO SEPTEMBER 1942 98. NO PAY OR NO ANSWER 99. INAPPLICABLE 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S047.Q46E. DID YOU GET ALL THE PAY COMING TO YO?  1. YES 2. NO 3. DON'T KNOW OR UNCERTAIN 4. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S047.Q47A. "AFTER THE WAR, WE SHOULD ALLOW THE GERMAN PEOPLE TO RUN THEIR OWN GOVERNMENT*"  1. AGREE 2. DON'T KNOW OR UNCERTAIN 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q47B. "WE SHOULD SEE TO IT THAT THE JAPANESE PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY FOR ALL THE TROUBLE THEY ARE CAUSING US."  1. AGREE 2. DON'T KNOW OR UNCERTAIN 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q47C. "AFTER THE WAR, WE SHOULD ALLOW THE JAPANESE PEOPLE TO RUN THEIR OWN GOVERNMENT."  1. AGREE 2. DON'T KNOW OR UNCERTAIN 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q47D. "WE SHOULD SEE TO IT THAT THE GERMAN PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY FOR ALL THE TROUBLE THEY ARE CAUSING US."  1. AGREE 2. DON'T KNOW OR UNCERTAIN 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q47E. "WHEN THE WAR IS OVER WE MUST SEE TO IT THAT THE GERMAN PEOPLE CAN NEVER AGAIN EXIST AS A NATION."  1. AGREE 2. DON'T KNOW OR UNCERTAIN 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q47F. "THE BRITISH AND AMERICANS WERE FAR TOO SOFT WITH THE GERMANS AFTER THE LAST WAR."  1. AGREE 2. DON'T KNOW OR UNCERTAIN 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q47G. "WE HAVE NOT ONLY TO BEAT THE GERMAN LEADERS BUT THE GERMAN PEOPLE TOO. EVERY LAST GERMAN MUST FEEL THE MIGHT OF THE ALLIED POWERS."  1. AGREE 2. DON'T KNOW OR UNCERTAIN 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q47H. "WHEN YOU GET THE DROP ON A JAPANESE SOLDIER, KILL HIM. DON'T BOTHER TO TAKE HIM PRISONER."  1. AGREE 2. DON'T KNOW OR UNCERTAIN 3. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S047.Q48. THINK FOR A MINUTE ABOUT THE DIFFERENT SERGEANTS AND CORPORALS YOU HAVE SERVED WITH. HOW FAIR DO MOST OF THEM SEEM TO BE WITH THEIR ME?  1. MOST OF THEM ARE FAIR 2. ABOUT HALF ARE, HALF ARE NOT 3. MOST OF THEM ARE NOT FAIR 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S047.Q49. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 3. SERGEANT (ANY GRADE) OR TECHNICIAN 3RD OR 4TH GRADE 0. NO ANSWER CARD 2
S047.CARD.  2. CARD TWO

S047.V52. DATE ENTERED ARMY (STOCKADE GROUP ONLY)*  1. FEBRUARY, MARCH, APRIL 1943 2. NOVEMBER OR DECEMBER 1942, JANUARY 1943 3. AUGUST, SEPTEMBER, OCTOBER 1943 4. MAY, JUNE, JULY 1942 5. MAY, 1941, APRIL 1942 6. APRIL 1941 OR BEFORE 9. INAPPLICABLE 0. NO ANSWER

S047.V53. CAMP AND OUTFIT IDENTIFICATION AND SERVICE NUMBE  ANP X. FIRST COLUMN OF V.53 IDENTIFIED AS FOLLOWS: 1. SELECTED COMPANIES, 2ND REGIMENT (N=332) 2. FIFTH REGIMENT (N=257) 3. OTHER COMPANIES, 2ND REGIMENT (N=441) 4. MEN IN STOCKADE (N=256) X. DATA AND CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION FOR THE FOLLOWING SCORES. THE QUESTIONS INVOLVED ARE AS FOLLOWS: GRIPE SCORE - QUESTIONS 7, 8, 9, 10, 12, 13, 20. PERSONAL ADJUSTMENT SCORE - QUESTIONS 11, 16, 17, 18. WORRY SCORE - QUESTIONS 28, 29, 30, 31, 32, 33. CIVILIAN SUPPORT SCORE - QUESTIONS 34, 35, 36.
